subject: Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The former major leaguer Jim Leyritz, who is facing trial on D.U.I. manslaughter charges, was taken to a Florida hospital after telling the police he was concerned about failing a Breathalyzer test and was “under a lot of stress” because of his legal problems. Leyritz, 45, faces trial in Fort Lauderdale in a December 2007 crash that killed a woman.
